content: Hi, someone on Discord asked me to post this because apparently their Zulip account is broken: rust-lang/rust should enable this setting: https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/configuring-branches-and-merges-in-your-repository/configuring-pull-request-merges/managing-suggestions-to-update-pull-request-branches. What it does is makes the "update base branch" button use a rebase inside pull requests instead of a merge commit, because rebasing is annoying.
